title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister agriculture food marine) order 2024

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. Amii McKeever, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Amii McKeever, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with 
effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 amii mckeever particular whose address deposited office department agriculture food marine appointed special adviser minister agriculture food marine effect 9 april 2024

title: Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. Ciaran O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Ciaran O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 
with effect from 9 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

25 June, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [329] 3
